amendment.description: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for implementing or enforcing COVID-19 vaccine mandates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4868 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 476.

action.text: Amendment SA 4868 proposed by Senator Marshall. (consideration: CR S8905-8906; text: CR S8905) To prohibit the use of Federal funds for implementing or enforcing COVID-19 vaccine mandates.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4868 proposed by Senator Marshall.
